lead_paragraph: In Hillsborough, where liberal and conservative factions have peacefully managed the tensions between them, residents said the attack did not reflect the town’s spirit.

byline.contributor: Alan Blinder contributed reporting from Atlanta.

headline.print_headline: Firebombing of G.O.P. Office Jolts a Town’s Fragile Balance
headline.main: Firebombing of G.O.P. Office Jolts Fragile Balance of a North Carolina Town

snippet: In Hillsborough, where liberal and conservative factions have peacefully managed the tensions between them, residents said the attack did not reflect the town’s spirit....
abstract: Firebombing attack on local Republican headquarters in Hillsborough, NC, is still under investigation by federal, state and local officials, with no arrests announced; residents say attack is out of step with spirit of small town, which has largely found amicable balance between liberal and conservative factions in face of cultural change.
